preference.name: CNO_TRACE
preference.preference_description: This is a define for the trace of the CNO Extensions. Default is info. This is a site Preference.

preference.name: CNO_QUERY_DEBUG_LEVEL
preference.preference_description: This is a define for the debug level of the CNO Validation Framework. Default is info. This is a site Preference.

preference.name: CNO_QUERY_OBJECTS_DISPLAY_STRING
preference.preference_description: This is a define for the display text for objects of a specific ItemType used for the CNO Framework display_string xml property. This can be a group or site Preference.

preference.name: CNO_QUERY_ROOT_OBJECTS_COUNT_LIMIT
preference.preference_description: This is a define for a limit for search results. This is a site Preference.

preference.name: CNO_STORE_VALIDATION_ON_TASK
preference.preference_description: This is a define to enable the Validation Framework to store the result on the EPMTask. Default is true. This is a site Preference.

preference.name: CNO_VALIDATION_ADMIN_GROUPS
preference.preference_description: Teamcenter Groups which are able to modify configurations

preference.name: CNO_VALIDATION_BOM_MODIFICATION_CHECK_RULES
preference.preference_description: This is a define for the check rules of a specific types used for the CNO Validation Framework UI. This can be a group or site Preference.

preference.name: CNO_VALIDATION_CHECK_RULES
preference.preference_description: This is a define for the check rules of a specific ItemType used for the CNO Validation Framework UI. This can be a group or site Preference.

preference.name: CNO_VALIDATION_CLIENT_OBJECTS
preference.preference_description: This is a define to set the selectable object types and classes in the user interface. (RAC and AW)

preference.name: CNO_VALIDATION_CLIENT_SHOW_CHECK_DETAILS
preference.preference_description: This is a define to enable the display of validation steps in the user interface. (RAC and AW)

preference.name: CNO_VALIDATION_COMPARE_RULES
preference.preference_description: This is a define for the compare rules of a specific ItemType used for the CNO Compare UI. This can be a group or site Preference.

preference.name: CNO_VALIDATION_CREATE_OBJECT_CHECK_RULES
preference.preference_description: This is a define for the check rules of a specific types used for the CNO Validation Framework UI. This can be a group or site Preference.

preference.name: CNO_VALIDATION_LICENSE
preference.preference_description: This is a define for the location of the license file for the CNO Validation Framework.

preference.name: CNO_VALIDATION_RAC_ADMIN_CONFIG_WIZARD_CHK_RULE_SELECTIONS
preference.preference_description: This is a define for the chk rule selection in the Admin config wizard for the CHK file creation.

context.name: Teamcenter
context.value: Is Equal=§eq§valid value~value is not valid
Is not Equal=§not eq§any value~value is not valid
Value Check=§gt§1~Value is not gerater than 1
Value Check=§lt§1~Value is not lower than 1
Between check=§bt§4;6~Value must be between 4 and 6
1 or more occurrences=§count gt 0§*~object not found
2 occurrences or less=§count lt 3§*~more than 2 occurrences
Lov Dependency=§allowed§[LOV:LovName]~Attribute is not in the list

preference.name: CNO_VALIDATION_RAC_RESULT_FILTER_DEFAULT
preference.preference_description: This is a define to set the default filter for the result. (SHOW_ALL_RESULT|HIDE_PASSED_CHECK_RESULT|HIDE_PASSED_OBJECTS)

preference.name: CNO_VALIDATION_RAC_SHOW_OLD_RESULT_UI
preference.preference_description: This is a define to show the old Validation UI.

preference.name: CNO_VALIDATION_REPORT_EXCEL_TEMPLATE
preference.preference_description: This is a define for the excel validation report. This can be a group or site Preference.

preference.name: CNO_VALIDATION_REPORT_RULES
preference.preference_description: This is a define for the reporting selections of a specific ItemType used for the CNO Reproting UI. This can be a group or site Preference.

preference.name: CNO_VALIDATION_REVISE_OBJECT_CHECK_RULES
preference.preference_description: This is a define for the check rules of a specific types used for the CNO Validation Framework UI. This can be a group or site Preference.

preference.name: CNO_VALIDATION_SAVEAS_OBJECT_CHECK_RULES
preference.preference_description: This is a define for the check rules of a specific types used for the CNO Validation Framework UI. This can be a group or site Preference.

preference.name: CNO_VALIDATION_SAVE_OBJECT_CHECK_RULES
preference.preference_description: This is a define for the check rules of a specific types used for the CNO Validation Framework UI. This can be a group or site Preference.

preference.name: CNO_VALIDATION_SAVE_PROPERTY_CHECK_RULES
preference.preference_description: This is a define for the check rules of a specific types used for the CNO Validation Framework UI. This can be a group or site Preference.

preference.name: CNO_VALIDATION_WORKFLOW_DESCRIPTION
preference.preference_description: This is a define to set the text for the description of the workflow, which is triggered via task configuration.

preference.name: CNO_VALIDATION_WORKFLOW_NAME_PATTERN
preference.preference_description: This is a define to set the pattern for the name of the workflow, which is triggered via task configuration. ({$object_string}, {$item_id}, {$item_revision_id}, {$object_name})
